Package org.hibernate.ogm.transaction.impl

This package contains all required OGM customizations around transaction creation and management.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmulatedLocalTransaction
    A emulated transaction whose only purpose it is to make sure that on commit the appropriate flush events gets triggered.
    ErrorHandlerEnabledTransactionDecorator
    A TransactionImplementor wrapper which triggers invocation of the user-configured ErrorHandler upon failed operations, rollbacks etc.
    ErrorHandlerEnabledTransactionDecoratorFactory
    A TransactionFactory which takes transactions created by another factory and decorates them with the ErrorHandlerEnabledTransactionDecorator.
    ForwardingTransactionImplementor
    A TransactionImplementor delegating all methods to another TransactionImplementor instance.
    JTATransaction
    Transaction implementation using JTA transactions exclusively from the TransactionManager.
    OgmJtaPlatformInitiator  
    OgmTransactionFactory
    TransactionFactory allowing to choose between JTA transactions retrieved from the TransactionManager or to emulate transactions via EmulatedLocalTransaction.
    OgmTransactionFactoryInitiator
    Use OgmTransactionFactory as the default value if no TransactionFactory is set.

Package org.hibernate.ogm.transaction.impl Description

This package contains all required OGM customizations around transaction creation and management.
